'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_tar_statis_tb
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT
FROM ht_tar_statis_tb WHERE TS_ID = #{tsId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND OP_TYPE != 'D'
mapper.update: UPDATE ht_tar_statis_tb SET OP_TYPE = 'D' WHERE TS_ID = #{tsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

where SUB_CODE = #{subCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TARGET_CODE = #{targetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
